articles.title: FDA could move closer to approving first new Alzheimer's drug in nearly 20 years
articles.description: The US Food and Drug Administration soon will consider whether to approve a new Alzheimer's drug for the first time in almost two decades.

articles.title: Abby Phillip: Trump wants people out there defending him
articles.description: CNN's Abby Phillip explains why a tweet from Eric Trump questioning the Republican Party's support for his father is an indication of what the President wants from his party and supporters.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Will Donald Trump's final act be defining the presidency downward?
articles.description: In the space of 30 minutes on Thursday afternoon, the two candidates for president both put out statements on the ongoing 2020 vote count.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: State official gives impassioned defense of elections
articles.description: During a press conference, Pennsylvania's Secretary of State Kathy Boockvar spoke passionately in defense of local officials working tirelessly to ensure "every voter, every candidate and every party have access to a fair, free, safe and secure election."

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard, CNN
articles.title: Medical school students' Hippocratic oath asks doctors to combat racism, misinformation
articles.description: In a new Hippocratic oath written by the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine's Class of 2024, incoming students pledged to fight the spread of misinformation and racial injustice. The oath names Breonna Taylor, George Floyd and Ahmaud Arbery.

articles.title: From stylish to silly: Face masks for every personality
articles.description: From flowers and sequins to Baby Yoda, there's no shortage of fun, creative and honestly cute-looking face masks out there.

articles.author: Lauren Dezenski, CNN
articles.title: Rhode Island voters approve removing 'Plantations' from state's official name over concerns about the word's history
articles.description: The smallest state in the nation will no longer have the longest name.

articles.author: Opinion by Elizabeth Yuko
articles.title: I'm a Covid-19 survivor. This election hurts
articles.description: No matter the outcome of the 2020 presidential race, Elizabeth Yuko says it's not the coronavirus election many survivors like her were hoping for. The race's razor-thin margin is a blow, she writes, but also an indicator of how urgent it is for officials to …

articles.author: Sara Ashley O'Brien, CNN Business
articles.title: Uber misses on earnings
articles.description: Just two days after a political win in its home state of California, Uber's third quarter earnings report shows the ongoing negative impact of the pandemic on its business. But the company is still setting its sights on profitability sometime in 2021.

articles.author: Analysis by Lisa Respers France, CNN
articles.title: Feel-good content is what we need right now. You're welcome
articles.description: The world has felt even more doom-and-gloom this year, and what's missing more than anything is a bit of fun. Here are some ideas for feel-good content you can stream in the safety of your own home.

articles.author: By Maureen O'Hare, CNN
articles.title: This bar's been named the world's best (now good luck getting in)
articles.description: The Connaught Bar in London has just been named 2020's best bar in the world. But a new UK lockdown means it will be a while before patrons can sidle up for a drink inside.
articles.content:

articles.author: Brent Swails and David McKenzie, CNN
articles.title: Why are there fears of civil war in Ethiopia?
articles.description: When Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed of Ethiopia received the Nobel Peace Prize last year, he was lauded as a regional peacemaker. Now, he is being asked to pull his own country back from the brink of civil war.

articles.title: LEGO Star Wars special reimagines fan favorites as toys
articles.description: The LEGO adaptation picks up where "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker" left off, bringing a galaxy from far, far away to your living room on Disney+.

articles.title: 'The process is working': Joe Biden calls for calm
articles.description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden asks for patience and urges Americans to remain calm as votes continue to be counted in several battleground states.

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN
articles.title: Home sales in the New York suburbs are past their pandemic peak
articles.description: Home sales in the New York City suburbs, where real estate activity exploded as people fled the city amid pandemic-related shutdowns, are starting to cool off.

articles.title: See how Arizona vote counting site is preparing for more protests
articles.description: As votes continue to be counted in Arizona, county election officials in Phoenix have installed a fence around the Maricopa County Elections Department in preparation for more protests.

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.title: Retailers that boarded up stores are in limbo as the US vote count drags on
articles.description: Some major companies that increased security measures in case there was post-Election Day violence are grappling with the prospect of staying boarded up far longer than planned as the presidential vote count drags on.
